category.name: Donuts
category.special_instructions: Golden, fluffy donut glazed to perfection and sprinkled with sweetness.

menu_items.name: Chocolate Donut
menu_items.description: Rich chocolate donut coated in smooth chocolate glaze, drizzled with dark chocolate, and topped with a sprinkle of cocoa nibs for a decadent finish.

menu_items.name: Glazed Donut
menu_items.description: Soft, airy donut dipped in a sweet, glossy vanilla glaze, finished with a delicate sugary sheen for the perfect melt-in-your-mouth experience.

menu_items.name: Strawberry Iced Donut
menu_items.description: Fluffy donut dipped in a luscious strawberry glaze, topped with a drizzle of strawberry icing and a sprinkle of dried strawberry bits for a fruity, delightful finish.

menu_items.name: Cinnamon Milk Glazed Donut
menu_items.description: Warm, fluffy donut infused with hints of cinnamon, dipped in a creamy cinnamon milk glaze, and finished with a dusting of spiced sugar and a swirl of vanilla drizzle for a perfectly comforting bite.
